title: ‘Joining Forces’: Genesis and Gemini Discussed Merger Before Collapse
description: Before Genesis froze withdrawals, court documents show DCG head Barry Silbert proposed a merger with Gemini.

title: Nissan launches metaverse experience blending car history with driver education
description:
The new experience is available on VRChat for Meta Quest.

Nissan Motor Co. announced the launch of a new history and safety-themed metaverse experience on March 7. 

Called the “Heritage Cars & Safe Drive Studio,” the new exhibit combines immersive depictions featuring three of Nissan’s most iconic automobiles from history with interactive educational safety exhibits.

Per a press release from Nissan:

Read more

title: Gary Gensler defers question about his stance on Ethereum
description: The chair of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), Gary Gensler, recently declined to provide a definitive stance on whether Ethereum should be classified as a security. Despite numerous applications for spot Ethereum ETFs under the SEC’s consideration, Gary Gensler refrained from giving a clear answer when questioned about Ethereum’s status as a security […]

title: Nigeria’s apex bank taps Gluwa to accelerate e-Naira CBDC adoption
description: The Central Bank of Nigeria has partnered with Gluwa, a blockchain infrastructure firm, to drive the adoption of the country's central bank digital currency, the e-Naira.

title: Binance to reward users for accurate listing predictions
description: Binance Futures launches a listing prediction platform, rewarding users for correct forecasts.

title: Shiba Inu Addresses Surge 20x: Is This the Start of a Bullish Trend?
description:
March kicked off with a bang for Shiba Inu (SHIB) as the meme coin attracted over 8.4k new addresses daily, reaching a peak of 21k new daily addresses. As highlighted by IntoTheBlock, this surge, nearly 20 times February’s daily average, reflects a notable uptick in interest despite the recent market correction. Traders, particularly bullish on […]

title: Pantera in Fundraising Efforts To Finance Purchase of Solana (SOL) Valued at $250,000,000 From FTX: Report
description:
Crypto asset manager Pantera Capital is reportedly raising funds to finance a nine-figure purchase of smart contract platform Solana (SOL) from bankrupt crypto exchange FTX. According to a new report by Bloomberg, Pantera is seeking funds to buy $250 million worth of the Ethereum (ETH) rival from the failed digital asset exchange. The report cites […]

title: Firewall Raises $3.7 Million To Take Smart Contracts Mainstream With Programmable Finality
description:
